name: SafeArea
desc: A widget that insets its child with sufficient padding to avoid intrusions by the operating system.

fields.name: left
fields.desc: Whether to avoid system intrusions on the left.

fields.name: top
fields.desc: Whether to avoid system intrusions at the top of the screen, typically the system status bar.

fields.name: right
fields.desc: Whether to avoid system intrusions on the right.

fields.name: bottom
fields.desc: Whether to avoid system intrusions on the bottom side of the screen.

fields.name: maintainBottomViewPadding
fields.desc: Specifies whether the [SafeArea] should maintain the bottom [MediaQueryData.viewPadding] instead of the bottom [MediaQueryData.padding], defaults to false.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

nodes.name: SafeArea Usage Test
desc: 【left】: Whether to enable the left side   【bool】
【right】: Whether to enable the right side   【bool】
